title: One of thousands
creator_credit: Ralph Basson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: As a veteran who served in Normandy during World War II, Ralph Basson takes us on a sensory tour of war. In this, Ralph highlights the things you cling to in order to survive. ‘With all the chaos going on around you, you have to remember your training and just put one foot in front of the other’.
creator_credit_for_label: Ralph Basson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
